function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';

ruleContent.content:
<js>
z = source.getVariable().split(",");
if(!(parseInt(z[0])>0)){
  let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@#chaptercontent@p@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)

  
}else if(parseInt(z[0])){
  src=eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
result=java.getString("id.chaptercontent@html",src)
result
}

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
var TextNode = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.TextNode;
var Node = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Node;


var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var result = [];

var postList = document.select("#postlist > div");

postList.forEach(function(post) {
   
    var postId = post.id();

    
    var author = post.select(".postinfo > a").text();

    
    var time = post.select(".authorinfo > em").text();

    
    var contentElement = post.select(".t_msgfont").first(); 
    if (contentElement) {
        
        contentElement.select("font, span").remove();

      
        var contentNodes = contentElement.childNodes();
        var content = "";
        contentNodes.forEach(function(node) {
            if (node instanceof TextNode) {
                content += node.getWholeText() + "\n"; 
            } else if (node instanceof Element) {
                
                if (node.tagName().equals("br")) {
                    content += "\n"; 
                } else {
                    content += node.text() + "\n"; 
                }
            }
        });
    } else {
        var content = ""; 
    }

    
    var item = {
        "data": "ä½œè€…ï¼š" + author + " " + time + "\n" + content.trim(),
        "id": postId
    };

    
    result.push(item);
});


var mergedData = result.map(item => item.data).join("\n\n"); 

mergedData;
</js>
